com.sadakatsu.clue.cards
Class Card

java.lang.Object
  com.sadakatsu.clue.cards.Card
Direct Known Subclasses:
Room, Suspect, Weapon
public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object

The Card class represents a Card from the game of Clue. There are three types of Cards -- Suspect, Weapon, and Room -- which have their own subclasses.

Author:
Joseph A. Craig

from

public static Card from(java.lang.String abbreviation)
Finds and returns the Card whose abbreviation matches the passed abbreviation when ignoring case.

Parameters:
abbreviation - The abbreviation of the Card to get.
Returns:
The Card instance if the abbreviation is valid, null otherwise.
